p: EO, MeOH and 70% EtOH extracts of O. campechianum were subjected to the 3-(4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2,5-diphenyl- 2H-tetrazolium bromide (MTT) assay [ 37] for the evaluation of their cytotoxic effects on lung carcinoma (A549) during 24 h of exposure ( Figure 1). The obtained data were compared with the values of the medium with dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) 0.1% (negative control), and doxorubicin was used as positive control (concentration range 0.1 to 20 μg/mL, IC 50 = 2.92 ± 0.12 μg/mL).
